body.p: The default templates are stored in ${frameworks}/tei/templates/TEI P5 folder and they can be used for easily creating basic TEI P5 documents. These templates are available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates:

ul.li: TEI P5 - All - New TEI P5 All;
TEI P5 - Bare - New TEI P5 Bare;
TEI P5 - Lite - New TEI P5 Lite;
TEI P5 - Math - New TEI P5 Math;
TEI P5 - Speech - New TEI P5 Speech;
TEI P5 - SVG - New TEI P5 with SVG extensions;
TEI P5 - XInclude - New TEI P5 XInclude aware.
